channel.title: Special Attacks Problem - Reward
channel.description: First off, help me succesfully and you'll be a mod on LeScape Pk V2 my problem: when i use specials, the energy drains it does the special woohoo all good, but the bar doesnt drain. It's always a full green bar. tbh im too busy coding other shit to work on this, so im offering mod reward, please and thank you.

}

}

item.title: Special Attacks Problem - Reward
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

First off, help me succesfully and you’ll be a mod on LeScape Pk V2
my problem:
when i use specials, the energy drains it does the special woohoo all good, but the bar doesnt drain. It’s always a full green bar.
tbh im too busy coding other shit to work on this, so im offering mod reward, please and thank you.

Read full topic
